thread.title: DA 'attacked' by ANC supporters while preparing for Tshwane launch
thread.title_full: DA 'attacked' by ANC supporters while preparing for Tshwane launch | News24

author: news24.com
title: DA 'attacked' by ANC supporters while preparing for Tshwane launch
text:
Johannesburg - The DA claims it was attacked by ANC supporters in Pretoria on Friday while preparing for the launch of its Tshwane mayoral candidate Solly Msimanga's campaign.
"Late [on Friday] afternoon ANC supporters physically attacked DA supporters and staff members, who have subsequently been taken to hospital for treatment," the party said in a statement.
"The ANC’s violent actions today are the clearest indication yet that they can lose Tshwane and that the DA can win in next year’s local government election."
The Democratic Alliance said equipment which was to be used at the launch was destroyed.
